name: Betty & Earl
description:
Betty & Earl is a relaxing and thoughtful puzzle game where you control everything at the same time in order to reunite the two main characters. The world is connected, and whenever you move, everything follows. Find a way to reconnect Betty & Earl in a world that constantly gets in the way.

Everything is Connected

Everything in Betty & Earl is connected. When you move right, everything moves right. When you move left, everything moves left.


Enemies

Creatures can get in the way. Slide them together in order to clear a path.


Friends

Use those same creatures to interact with the world when Betty & Earl cannot. Use them to pick up keys, open doors, remove obstacles to clear the way for Betty & Earl to reunite.


Features

  • Beautiful, original artwork with help from the incredibly skilled @helveticablanc
  • Over a hundred thoughtful, bite-sized puzzles that delight instead of frustrate
  • Toki Pona, a language with only 120 words, created by Sonja Lang
